title: Patriots-Chiefs, Jason Garrett, Antonio Brown, & the Eagles
itunes:title: Patriots-Chiefs, Jason Garrett, Antonio Brown, & the Eagles
description:
Colin explains why the New England Patriots will have a huge advantage over the Kansas City Chiefs, why Jason Garett is simply a B+ coach, why Pittsburgh Steelers WR Antonio Brown is making a mistake, and the reason the Philadelphia Eagles are the best run team in the NFC. Guests include James Harrison, Geoff Schwartz, Eric Mangini, and T. J. Houshmandzadeh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
